text:
Full-stack Engineer: Adobe - Seattle - ONSITE

About us: Yes, we make more than Flash and Acrobat.

You: craftsperson who cares about what you produce, experiened with MV* JS apps, play well with others.

Us: competitive compensation, top-quality teammates, proper work-life balance, wiffle ball.

https://adobe.taleo.net/careersection/2/jobdetail.ftl?job=37...
